full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for Remedial Excavation Services

## Solicitation Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit their qualifications for the Phase 2 Remedial Excavation for Atlin Lots 1 and 2 in Atlin, British Columbia.

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4159261955
* **Publication Date**: September 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 27, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 29, 2023
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada and British Columbia
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada and British Columbia

## Solicitation Overview
This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is issued as part of the Phase 2 process for the Remedial Excavation for Atlin Lots 1 and 2. Suppliers who have previously qualified for the project will be invited to submit their bids.

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this solicitation will be based on the lowest price.

## Who Should Respond?
To be considered for this Invitation to Qualify, suppliers must meet the following requirements:
* be a qualified supplier
* have the necessary expertise and experience in remedial excavation services
* comply with all trade agreements and regulations

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact:
* **Name**: Ken Ngan (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not available

Please note that this solicitation is currently expired.
